data.title: Avoid on Mondays
data.text: This is the closest restaurant to my job so if I'm in a big hurry, I'll stop here, except on Mondays.  Jury picks for trials are done on Monday and this is the closest restaurant to the courthouse.  There are typically 250-400 people summoned to jury duty each week and those who aren't familiar with downtown stop here because it's the first thing they come across.  The sandwiches are your typical subway quality.  Not gourmet but by no means bad.

data.title: Good and Consistent
data.text: This was a lunch stop for me while in Tampa.  One thing is the consistent food taste and service. The Tuna seemed to be very fresh and the bread was very good as well. Thanks for being downtown within walking distance from where I was for the week.
